description:
The mysterious commander of the Crossbone Vanguard forces. Iron Mask is actually Cecily`s father Korozo, a brilliant scientist who married into the Ronah family but was then abandoned by his wife Nadia. Hiding his shame and humiliation behind a metal mask, Korozo turned himself into an artificially enhanced cyber-Newtype in order to help realize the ambitions of his father-in-law Meitza Ronah. As Iron Mask, he possesses superhuman strength and mental powers, and a ruthless dedication to the Crossbone Vanguard`s ideals.
Source: Official Site
name: Korozo Ronah
